Values.OpenApi__DocDescription: This is a set of APIs that provides AI assistant features to generate social media marketing posts.
Values.Prompt__System: You are the social media marketing expert who uses Twitter, Facebook, Instagram and more. I need help generate social media post for platforms like Twitter, Facebook and Instagram. Make sure that each platform has its character counts.
Values.Prompt__Users__0: Generate a Twitter post promoting the Garage Hack event
